name: Independence Arch
description: A historic monument symbolizing Ghana's independence from colonial rule.

name: Kwame Nkrumah Mausoleum
description: The final resting place of Ghana’s first president, Kwame Nkrumah.

name: Labadi Beach
description: One of Accra’s most popular beaches, known for its lively atmosphere and entertainment.

name: Jamestown Lighthouse
description: A colonial-era lighthouse offering panoramic views of the city and coastline.

name: W.E.B. DuBois Center
description: A museum and research center dedicated to the life and work of W.E.B. DuBois.

name: Makola Market
description: A bustling market offering everything from textiles to fresh produce.

name: Accra Mall
description: A modern shopping mall with international brands and restaurants.

name: Artists Alliance Gallery
description: A contemporary art gallery showcasing Ghanaian and African artists.
